snippet.title: Magic Inn - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: See how you can decorate your tavern in this new trailer for Magic Inn, an upcoming tavern life simulator game. In Magic Inn, take on the role of an exiled wizard-turned-innkeeper, overseeing everything from menus, rooms, guests, and staff in a fully magical customizable inn. Engage in card battles to spark conversations and foster relationships with guests. Magic Inn heads to Early Access on PC on December 3, 2024.
